pluginHighlight: Seamlessly integrate Figma Variables into Tailwind CSS, CSS Variables or shadcn/ui projects

shadcnUi.title: shadcn/ui integration
shadcnUi.description: Make any shadcn/ui component have different brand colors, density modes, dark and light themes, and device modes, and easily meet your design system specifications

multiMode.title: Multi-mode support
multiMode.description: Support for exporting compound multi-dimensional mode variables

mergeTypographyStyles.title: Merge typography variables
mergeTypographyStyles.description: Merge and export text and typography-related variables

cssMediaQueryMode.title: CSS media query mode
cssMediaQueryMode.description: Export variables in media query mode

typography.title: Typography system
typography.description: Suggestions for organizing text and typography variables

figmaTemplate.heading: Figma template
figmaTemplate.title: Includes basic variables needed to build design tokens
figmaTemplate.description: Start building your own design tokens here, including variables for colors, spacing, fonts, and more, with multiple modes for themes, brands, devices, and density.

example.heading: Example
example.title: Example
example.description: Easily make shadcn/ui components support different brand color themes, density modes, dark and light themes, and border radius styles.
example.note: Simply set variables in Figma to make shadcn/ui comply with your design system specifications and easily extensible.
